page.title: 08Housing-Broughton/Holt
page.content: TYPES Housing in this area includes 2% tied cottages, 10% semi-detached council houses, 20% bungalows of which 5% are detached. The remaining houses are 18% detached 40% semi-detached and 10% terraced cottages. There are 22 farmhouses in this area and 5% of all houses are substantial properties some of which are of considerable age and architectural interest, including Great Chalfield a fortified manor complete with moat which is now National Trust property (see tourism). Of all the housing surveyed 20% are of pre 1900 construction. DEVELOPEMENT In Broughton developement is strictly controlled and restricted to infil sites.
